logic

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Constants

  • public class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Constants. Contains constants used in the program.

    • Field Detail

      • SENSITIVITY

        public static int SENSITIVITY
        used to set min and max for the green color. If this value goes up, it will detect a larger range of colors. If this value goes down, it will detect less greenish colors.

      • GREEN

        public static int GREEN
        value for green in hsv format If this value goes up it will detect redish colors. If this value goes down, it will detect yellowish colors.

      • SV

        public static int SV
        min value of SV in an HSV format when detecting green pixels. If this value goes up, it will not detect some "dark" green colors.

      • MAXSIZE

        public static int MAXSIZE
        maximun size of a countour. if this value goes up, eliminates bigger blobs when using bwareopen. if this value goes down, eliminates smaller blobs when using bwareopen

      • minValue

        public static int minValue
        min value to normalize an image. If this value goes up, it will set the min value of a image bigger.

      • maxValue

        public static int maxValue
        max value to normalize an image. If this value goes up, it will set the max values of the image bigger. if this value goes down, it will set the max values of the image smaller.

      • SCOREPOINT1

        public static org.opencv.core.Point SCOREPOINT1
        point to paint the scoreboard black. Must not change.

      • SCOREPOINT2

        public static org.opencv.core.Point SCOREPOINT2
        point to paint the scoreboard black. Must not change.

      • STARTPOINT

        public static org.opencv.core.Point STARTPOINT
        start point of an image. Must not change.

      • BLACK

        public static org.opencv.core.Scalar BLACK
        black color in Scalar type. Must not change.

      • WHITE

        public static org.opencv.core.Scalar WHITE
        white color in Scalar Type. Must not change.

      • RED

        public static org.opencv.core.Scalar RED
        red color in scalar type. Must not change.

      • windowSize

        public static org.opencv.core.Size windowSize
        size of window for std If the window gets bigger, makes the players blobs bigger. If the windows get smaller, makes the players blobs smaller.
